DOC.brief_summary: Collect information about WILLFACT or WILFACTIN in their real life clinical use and identify the therapeutic practices in an international environment.
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional, prospective, non comparative, international, multicentre study.
DOC.criteria: Patients with inherited von Willebrand disease Patients treated with WILLFACT or WILFACTIN Patient or parent/legal representative who has provided written signed and dated informed consent before any data collection. Patients who usually do not keep injection log up to date, when treated.
